name: Terms
text: §602-8  Terms.  The supreme court shall be deemed to be in continuous session.  The court shall be deemed always open for filing papers, issuing and returning process, and issuing orders. [L 1892, c 57, §54; am L 1901, c 22, §1; RL 1925, §2227; RL 1935, §3596; RL 1945, §9607; RL 1955, §214-7; HRS §602-8; am L 1972, c 88, §2(d); ree L 1979, c 111, pt of §2; am L 1984, c 106, §1]
